ISSUE.TITLE: "SEO friendly URLs with multiple languages" doesn't properly work for forums
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Ensure that "SEO friendly URLs with multiple languages" option is enabled 2. Enable forums 3. Visit a forum page or a topic page without the language code specified (e.g /boards/forum/1/seo-name or /boards/topic/1/seo-name) 4. It should redirect to a new page with the language code (e.g /en/boards/forum/1/seo-name). But it'll redirect to the "page not found" page) It could cause SEO issues
